sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular polygon has 8 sides and each side measures 6cm. Find its perimeter.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of a regular polygon, you simply multiply the number of sides by the length of each side. In this case, the polygon has 8 sides and each side measures 6 cm.

Perimeter = (Number of sides) × (Length of each side)
Perimeter = 8 × 6 cm
Perimeter = 48 cm

The perimeter of the regular polygon is 48 cm.
